title: Hotel attack in Hurghada, Egypt : 'I thought I would die'
description: Three foreign tourists have been stabbed by two suspected Islamic State militants who stormed into a hotel in Egypt's Red Sea resort of Hurghada. One of those stabbed, a Swedish man who is now recovering, told the BBC he thought he would die in the attack. James Reynolds reports.
tags: three foreign tourists have been stabbed by two suspected islamic state militants who stormed into a hotel in egypt's red sea resort of hurghada.
